oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A novel catalyst-free synthesis of vertically aligned silicon nanowire-carbon nanotube heterojunction arrays for high performance electron field emitters
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KALE, VS
SATHE, BR
KUSHWAHA, A
ASLAM, M
SHELKE, MV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: EMISSION PROPERTIES
GROWTH
NANOBELTS
METALS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A novel, catalyst-free strategy for the direct synthesis of vertically aligned silicon nanowire-carbon nanotube (SiNW-CNT) heterojunction arrays is presented. Such a heterojunction with the junction area in the nanoscale displays enhanced field emission characteristics at low turn-on field, with a nearly three times increase in the field enhancement factor.
